translation.Message_0_Page_0:
Ah, the ranks? Uhm, let me get the exact notebook real fast...
Not the back pocket, where did I put it?
Right, here it is:
translation.Message_0_Page_1:
There are three main ranks to climb:
Major - Leader of a squad
Lieutenant - Deputy to a Major
Ensign - Soldier in a squad
translation.Message_0_Page_2:
Beyond that are the core members of the Coalition:
Admiral - Heads of state strategizing our global offensive, like Admiral Isch here
Captain - Leader of a contingent, such as myself
Commander - Right hand of a Captain, like Haider here
translation.Message_0_Page_3: Though, seems that these ranks don't exactly translate directly to the ranks that the <color=legendary>Concord</color> has, but they're quite close.
